Scripts.OnLoad:
function self:SetSize(pixels) self.size = pixels self.borderTop:ClearAllPoints() self.borderBottom:ClearAllPoints()
for i, tex in TMW:Vararg(self:GetRegions()) do tex:SetShown(pixels ~= 0) tex:SetSize(math.abs(pixels), math.abs(pixels)) end
-- Negative sizes should make inset borders. -- Positive sizes will make outset borders if 0 > pixels then pixels = 0 end
self.borderTop:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", -pixels, pixels) self.borderTop:SetPoint("TOPRIGHT", pixels, pixels)
self.borderBottom:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", -pixels, -pixels) self.borderBottom:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", pixels, -pixels)
end
function self:SetColor(r, g, b, a) a = a or 1
for i, tex in TMW:Vararg(self:GetRegions()) do tex:SetTexture(r, g, b, a) end end
self:SetSize(1) self:SetColor(0, 0, 0, 1)

local explanation = "" if not _G.TellMeWhen then local AceLocale = LibStub("AceLocale-3.0", true) local msg if AceLocale then local L = AceLocale:GetLocale("TellMeWhen", true) msg = L["ERROR_NOTLOADED_ERROR"] explanation = L["ERROR_NOTINITIALIZED_INTERFACEPANEL_EXPLANATION"] else msg = "TellMeWhen has failed to load! Are you missing a required library?" explanation = msg .. "\r\n\r\nAt the very least, you are missing AceLocale." end
DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("|cff33ff99TellMeWhen|r: " .. msg) else explanation = TMW.L["ERROR_NOTINITIALIZED_INTERFACEPANEL_EXPLANATION"]
self:RegisterEvent("PLAYER_REGEN_ENABLED") self:RegisterEvent("PLAYER_REGEN_DISABLED") end
self.name = "TellMeWhen" InterfaceOptions_AddCategory(self)
self.text:SetText(explanation)
Scripts.OnShow:
self.text:SetWidth(self:GetWidth() - 150)
if TMW and TMW:CheckCanDoLockedAction(false) then TMW:LoadOptions()
if TMW:AssertOptionsInitialized() then return end
if TMW.AddedToBlizz then self.text:SetText(TMW.L["ERROR_GAMEMENU_INTERFACE_OPTIONS_FUCKED"])
InterfaceOptionsFrame_OpenToCategory(TMW.AddedToBlizz)
-- Sometimes a lot of things fuck up and I have to do this. -- It might not even work (which is why ERROR_GAMEMENU_INTERFACE_OPTIONS_FUCKED exists) InterfaceOptionsFrame_OnShow() InterfaceOptionsFrame_OpenToCategory(TMW.AddedToBlizz)
self:UnregisterAllEvents() end end
Scripts.OnEvent:
if event == "PLAYER_REGEN_ENABLED" then self.text:SetText(TMW.L["ERROR_NOTINITIALIZED_INTERFACEPANEL_EXPLANATION"])
if self:IsShown() then self:Hide() self:Show() end elseif event == "PLAYER_REGEN_DISABLED" and not TMW.ALLOW_LOCKDOWN_CONFIG then self.text:SetText(TMW.L["ERROR_NOOPTIONSLOAD_INCOMBAT"]) end
